title: Primavera
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Ovo, Buffet, Take-out, Fusion, Taiwanese, Guatemalan
description: Taiwanese/Guatemalan fusion restaurant located in the Guatemala City metropolitan area. Offers a wide variety of tofu and seitan products, soy milk, chow mein, fried rice, spring rolls, and noodle dishes. Daily veggie buffet. Serves breakfast, lunch, and dinner.
streetAddress: 3 Calle 17-88, Sector B-6, Cuidad San Cristobal, Zona 8 de Mexico
